title: Nathan's First Web
description: Nathan, a shy 12-year-old science enthusiast, gets bitten by a genetically modified spider during a school field trip to a research lab. He discovers he has developed spider-like abilities and must learn to control his newfound powers.

title: The Making of Spider-Kid
description: As Nathan begins to master his wall-crawling and web-slinging abilities, he creates his own superhero costume and takes on the identity of Spider-Kid. His first attempts at heroism lead to both successes and humorous mishaps.

title: A Hero's Promise
description: When Nathan's beloved uncle is hurt trying to stop a crime, he learns that with great power comes great responsibility. He vows to use his abilities to protect the innocent and fight crime in his city.

title: Double Life
description: Nathan struggles to balance his new superhero life with school, family, and friendships. His grades start slipping, and his best friend Sarah begins to suspect something is different about him.

title: The Gecko's Challenge
description: Spider-Kid faces his first supervillain, The Gecko, a former scientist who transformed himself into a reptilian creature. Nathan must overcome his fears to protect his city.

title: Web of Secrets
description: Nathan discovers a conspiracy involving missing children in his city. As he investigates, he uncovers a sinister organization conducting illegal experiments on young people with special abilities.

title: Friend or Foe
description: Sarah finally discovers Nathan's secret identity. Their friendship is tested as she struggles with keeping his secret while helping him fight crime.

title: The Science Fair Disaster
description: During a school science fair, an experiment goes wrong, creating a dangerous situation. Nathan must find a way to save his classmates without revealing his identity.

title: Spider-Kid vs The Swarm
description: A mysterious villain who can control insects threatens the city. Nathan must overcome his arachnid instincts and face an army of bugs to save the day.

title: Family Ties
description: Nathan's parents notice his strange behavior and become worried. He struggles with the desire to tell them the truth while protecting them from the dangers of his superhero life.

title: The New Hero
description: Another young superhero appears in the city, and Nathan must decide whether to trust them or consider them a potential threat.

title: Dark Web
description: Nathan uncovers a dark web of corruption in the city's police force, forcing him to question who he can trust among the adults meant to protect citizens.

title: Power Surge
description: Nathan's powers begin to evolve and become unstable, causing him to lose control at crucial moments. He must learn to adapt to his changing abilities.

title: The School Bully
description: A bully at school gains super-strength from a mysterious source. Nathan must find a way to stop him without revealing his own identity or hurting someone who's essentially still a kid.

title: Spider-Kid: Origins Revealed
description: Nathan investigates the lab where he got his powers and discovers the spider bite wasn't an accident. Someone had been planning to create young superheroes.

title: The Winter Break Crisis
description: During winter break, the city is hit by a series of technological attacks. Nathan must solve the mystery while keeping his holiday commitments to family.

title: Mentor and Student
description: Nathan meets an older superhero who offers to train him, but their methods and morals don't always align, forcing Nathan to make difficult choices.

title: The Science Club Mystery
description: Members of Nathan's science club start developing strange abilities. He must help them while investigating who's experimenting on his classmates.

title: Spider-Kid Goes Viral
description: A viral video of Spider-Kid in action brings unwanted attention and copycats. Nathan must deal with his newfound fame while protecting his secret identity.

title: The Ultimate Test
description: Nathan faces his greatest challenge when a villain discovers his identity and threatens his family. He must find the courage to protect everything he holds dear.

title: Time Web
description: A mysterious device gives Nathan glimpses of potential futures, showing him the consequences of his choices as Spider-Kid.

title: Summer of the Spider
description: During summer vacation, Nathan visits his grandmother's small town, only to discover it has its own supernatural problems that need Spider-Kid's help.

title: The Spider Team
description: Nathan must learn to work with other young heroes when a threat too big for any one superhero emerges in the city.

title: Lost Powers
description: After a battle with a tech-savvy villain, Nathan temporarily loses his powers and must rely on his intelligence and courage alone.

title: The Parent Trap
description: Nathan's mother takes a job at the same research facility involved in the conspiracy he's investigating, putting both their lives at risk.

title: Spider-Kid: Unmasked
description: When a school reporter gets too close to discovering Spider-Kid's identity, Nathan must decide between protecting his secret and helping a friend in danger.

title: The Birthday Disaster
description: On Nathan's 13th birthday, a group of villains launches a coordinated attack on the city, forcing him to leave his own party to save others.

title: Web Warriors
description: Nathan discovers other spider-powered kids across the country and must unite them against a common enemy targeting young heroes.

title: The Final Exam
description: As Nathan prepares for his final exams, he uncovers a plot to steal the test answers using supernatural means. He must stop the cheaters while passing his own tests.

title: Legacy of the Spider
description: Nathan learns about a previous Spider-Kid from decades ago and uncovers a legacy of young heroes protecting the city.

title: Mind Web
description: A telepathic villain begins controlling the minds of Nathan's classmates. He must find a way to free them without hurting his friends.

title: The Science Project
description: Nathan's attempt to use his powers to help with a science project leads to unexpected consequences and valuable lessons about honesty.

title: Spider-Kid vs The System
description: Nathan faces his biggest challenge yet when he discovers that some of the city's most powerful people are behind the experiments on young people.

title: The Truth Comes Out
description: When his parents finally discover his secret, Nathan must help them understand and accept his life as Spider-Kid while protecting them from the dangers it brings.

title: Web of Trust
description: Nathan builds a support network of friends and family who know his secret, learning that being a hero doesn't mean having to be alone.

title: The Next Generation
description: As Nathan grows more confident in his role, he begins mentoring a younger kid who has developed similar powers, coming full circle in his hero's journey.

title: Spider-Kid: Evolution
description: In his most challenging adventure yet, Nathan must stop a plot to forcibly evolve humanity while dealing with another evolution of his own powers.

title: A Hero's Choice
description: Nathan faces a moral dilemma when he must choose between saving his city or protecting his secret identity, leading to a decision that will change his life forever.

title: The Amazing Spider-Kid
description: In this milestone story, Nathan finally accepts his role as both a normal kid and a superhero, understanding that both parts of his life make him who he is.

title: Spider-Kid: New Beginnings
description: As Nathan starts high school, he reflects on his journey and looks forward to new adventures, knowing he's ready for whatever challenges come next.

title: The Arachnid's Apprentice
description: Nathan takes on an apprentice, a young girl named Mia who has developed spider-like abilities. Together, they face new villains and learn the importance of teamwork.

title: The Venomous Threat
description: A new villain with venomous powers emerges, threatening the city's safety. Nathan must find a way to neutralize the threat while dealing with the fear of being poisoned.

title: The Quantum Web
description: Nathan discovers a way to travel through different dimensions using his web-slinging abilities. He encounters alternate versions of himself and learns valuable lessons from each dimension.

title: The Spider's Shadow
description: A dark version of Spider-Kid appears, causing chaos in the city. Nathan must confront his own fears and insecurities to defeat this shadowy adversary.

title: The Web of Time
description: Nathan accidentally travels back in time and meets his younger self. He must guide his younger self without altering the timeline and risking his own existence.

title: The Spider's Lair
description: Nathan discovers an underground lair filled with advanced technology and gadgets. He must uncover the lair's secrets and use its resources to protect the city.

title: The Arachnid Alliance
description: Nathan teams up with other spider-powered heroes from around the world to stop a global threat. Together, they learn the importance of unity and collaboration.

title: The Web of Lies
description: A master manipulator spreads false information about Spider-Kid, turning the city against him. Nathan must clear his name and expose the truth.

title: The Spider's Code
description: Nathan creates a code of ethics for himself and other young heroes to follow. He learns the importance of principles and the impact of his actions on others.
